predefinedIcons.title: Predefined Icons
predefinedIcons.description: A list of predefined icons available for the project.

loaderFile.title: Loader File
loaderFile.description: The loader assembly file of the project (usually named "Loader.S").

outputFile.title: Output File
outputFile.description: The output file of the loader (usually named "Loader.bin").

QLabel.title: Kamek (Optional)
QLabel.resources: Don't know how to setup Kamek ? Check out the %s for more information.

kamekFile.title: Kamek File
kamekFile.description: The file containing the list of patches of the project (usually named "NewerProject.yaml").

buildFolder.title: Kamek Build Folder
buildFolder.description:
The folder where the project will be built (usually named "Build").
WARNING: This folder will be deleted before each compilation !

copyType.title: Copy Type
copyType.description:
The type of copy that will be used to move the project after each compilation.
If unsure, leave this option to "Move".

outputFolder.title: Kamek Output Folder
outputFolder.description: The folder where the project will be moved after each compilation (usually named "NewerRes").

generatePALv1.title: Generate PAL v1 Version
generatePALv1.description: Determines whether the European version (EU • Revision 1) of the project will be generated.

generatePALv2.title: Generate PAL v2 Version
generatePALv2.description: Determines whether the European version (EU • Revision 2) of the project will be generated.

generateNTSCv1.title: Generate NTSC v1 Version
generateNTSCv1.description: Determines whether the American version (US • Revision 1) of the project will be generated.

generateNTSCv2.title: Generate NTSC v2 Version
generateNTSCv2.description: Determines whether the American version (US • Revision 2) of the project will be generated.

generateJPv1.title: Generate JP v1 Version
generateJPv1.description: Determines whether the Japanese version (JP • Revision 1) of the project will be generated.

generateJPv2.title: Generate JP v2 Version
generateJPv2.description: Determines whether the Japanese version (JP • Revision 2) of the project will be generated.

generateTW.title: Generate TW Version
generateTW.description: Determines whether the Taiwanese version (TW) of the project will be generated.

generateKR.title: Generate KR Version
generateKR.description: Determines whether the Korean version (KR) of the project will be generated.

generateCN.title: Generate CN Version
generateCN.description: Determines whether the Chinese version (CN) of the project will be generated.

nintendoDriverMode.title: Nintendo Driver Mode
nintendoDriverMode.description:
Determines whether the Nintendo Driver Mode will be enabled for CodeWarrior.
Nintendo Driver is a special mode that allows to compile some special code instructions for the game.
To use it, you need a special version of CodeWarrior.
If you don't know what this is, you probably don't need it (and please don't ask for it).

If unsure, leave this option disabled.

copy.title: Copy
copy.description: Copy the project files to the output folder, leaving the build folder untouched.

move.title: Move
move.description: Move the project files to the output folder, leaving the build folder empty.

reggieNextFolder.title: Reggie Next Folder
reggieNextFolder.description: The Reggie Next patch folder of the project, which contains the patch files (like "spritedata.xml", "sprites.py", etc.).

openReggieNextFolder.title: Reggie Next Folder
openReggieNextFolder.dialog: Sparkamek > Open Project > Reggie Next Folder

editReggieNextFolder.title: Reggie Next Folder
editReggieNextFolder.dialog: Sparkamek > Edit Project > Reggie Next Folder

riivolutionFile.title: Riivolution File
riivolutionFile.description: The Riivolution XML file of the project (usually named "NewerSMBW.xml").
